Texts.Eng:
Deer-like, these herbivorous pacifists are among the fastest of the known races. They are full of vitality, if a little fragile.
    
  Diet: Herbivore 
 
^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  +^green;15^reset;% speed
  Resist: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Electric
  Great Traders: +^green;15^reset;% Charisma
 
^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  ^green;Lush, Forest, Primeval, Rainforest, Savannah, Tundra, and Snow^reset; biomes:
    +^green;10^reset;% Physical Resistance, and Defense x^green;1.15^reset;
    
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Greataxe: Damage x^green;1.2^reset; 
  Axe / Spear: +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resist, Health x^green;1.05^reset;
  Spear: 3% chance of Ice element attack
  Chakram / Boomerang: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset; Crit Damage
  Bow: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.18^reset;
    
^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Resist: -^red;20^reset;% Poison, Fire, Physical
